column4: guys please help - 2 days ago i tried to upgrade intrepid -> jaunty. seems it didnt completed as update manager shows me the button to click to upgrade to 9.04. yesterday tried to do upgrade again. it closed with no signs of errors. still not upgraded. what's the shell command to do the upgrade? i wanna see the error messages if any,..? upgade-manager --dist-upgrade?
the safest way to do it from shell is: aptitude update && aptitude safe-upgrade && aptitude dist-upgrade   ... it'll do it in two passes.
you may need to do "do-release-upgrade" after my commands, too
